attributes.action: REMOVE ALL SPEED RAMPS FROM UK ROADS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speed ramps cause major problems for Emergency services, causes suspension damage to vehicles & often forces driving in middle of the road towards oncoming traffic. The slowing down for speed ramps also causes gear changing  which increases unneccessary noise & pollution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
